name: iRides Ferris Wheel FREE EDITION
description:
Who ever wanted to operate a ride? Control speeds and provide the highest possible level of driving pleasure for the visitors?

iRides - Ferris Wheel is a genre mix of simulation and action for your iPhone & iPod touch!

iRides - Ferris Wheel is the first app of its kind in the Appstore!
Put visitors into one of the gondolas and see the guests enjoying the ride.

But Attention: Make sure that the visitors do not lose the pleasure and the visitors queue doesn't get too long - furthermore you'll have to look at engine temperature - or it'll burn!

Do you have everything under control and can you keep the visitors happy?
Do you have what it takes to operate the ferris wheel?

Now place your skills to the test and break the highscore!

+++ Also take a look at our newest real simulation in 3d! - VirtualRides +++
